MoveUp, you control moving blocks as they jet across the sky. Your mission is to stop them precisely on top of one another to stack them. If you do the job well, you are rewarded with another block of the same size. However, if you fail to line up the blocks, the part left outside of the underlying block disappears and the next block you get is smaller. The smaller the blocks, the more challenging it is to stack them.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nDespite its simplicity, MoveUp can get highly engrossing. リラ　（CV：河瀬茉希）<br>見た目は天使、中身は小悪魔なカリスマギャル。<br>天才的なファッションセンスとメイク技術を持ち、JKの間で大人気の読者モデルでもある。<br>自分以外の生徒を「雑草」呼ばわりする毒舌家だが、ヒトの努力は決して笑わない誠実な一面も持つ。<br>実は、ドがつくほどの隠れオタク。<br><br><img ウラン　（CV：白城なお）<br>黒髪ロングに和風の羽織り、性格はおっとりマイペース。<br>華道に茶道、日舞に箏を得意とする、超が付くほどの“大和撫子”。<br>ただし、世俗から隔離された生い立ちから、男性や洋風文化には今まで縁がなく、壊滅的な洋菓子や英語を披露することもしばしば。<br><br><img エルメス　（CV：ななひら）<br>国民的人気を誇るトップアイドルであり、学園一の姫の称号「姫皇」の名を持つ美少女。<br>間近でウインクされれば、可愛さのあまり吹き飛んでしまうほどの「美少女」の化身。<br>多忙のため学園に来ることは稀だが、何故か時折ミナトの前に現れては親しげに話しかけてくる等、その行動には謎が多い。<br><br><img ダリア　（CV：寺井らん）<br>エルメスの姉であり、彼女を守る「騎士」。<br>見目麗しい外見と、優雅な立ち振舞から姫“騎士”と称されている。<br>優しく面倒見がよい反面、美少女を見ると口説かずにはいられない困った一面も…。<br>エリカの姉・マリカとは親友でもあった。<br><br>■ストーリー<br>主人公「伊草ミナト」は、男は女の子を守るものという考え方をもち、強い男を志す少年。<br>──にもかかわらず、女装してお嬢様学校へと潜入するはめになってしまう！！<br>さらには、学園最高峰の美少女「四姫」たちとの人気対決で、美少女の頂点を目指すことに！？<br><img quests. <br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nAfter the disappearance of their parents and the death of their guardian, Lucia and her brother Ulf lived and worked in a tavern. But their lives changed dramatically when Ulf turned 18. He turned out to be a werewolf, and that very night he was abducted by a witch and taken to an undisclosed location. Lucia is willing to risk everything for the sake of saving her brother, who always took care of her. She knows for sure that he would have done the same for her. For the first time in many years of her life, that she spent in alienation from the outside world, adventures await her in stranger places full of unpredictable dangers. class=\"bb_tag\">Story<\/h2><br>You play as investigative journalist &quot;Mr. Johnson&quot; after receiving several tips of a government cover up at a recently abandoned psychiatric hospital. All reports suggest illegal experiments taking place on the patients of the facility- and supposedly a government cover up. Detective Johnson decided to go through with this one off-books and after just a few days of preparation he sets out to explore the abandoned facility in the middle of the night, to recover patient records.<br><br>2AM: You arrive at the scene, it is a gloomy and silent night. Rain is pouring, wind flows through the air as an unsetteling feeling kicks in. Something isn't right here, but there is only one way to figure out what it is...<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Gameplay<\/h2><br>Insaniam is a first person survival horror game, your objective is to retrieve at least five patient records for the abandoned facility. <br>You'll be forced to scavenge for batteries to keep your camcorder charged, utilize the night vision mode to explore the dark, use sanity pills or stay in the light to keep sane, avoid hallucinations, while something is lurking in the darkness and so much more.<br>Gameplay is based around a speed run mechanic where you'll play for shortest time to escape or longest time survived. Randomized game mechanics keep this experience fresh and increases re-playablity.<br>The game is not story focused but there is underlying lore that is optional to explore through text, visuals or audio.","about_the_game":"<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Story<\/h2><br>You play as investigative journalist &quot;Mr. Johnson&quot; after receiving several tips of a government cover up at a recently abandoned psychiatric hospital. All reports suggest illegal experiments taking place on the patients of the facility- and supposedly a government cover up. Detective Johnson decided to go through with this one off-books and after just a few days of preparation he sets out to explore the abandoned facility in the middle of the night, to recover patient records.<br><br>2AM: You arrive at the scene, it is a gloomy and silent night. Rain is pouring, wind flows through the air as an unsetteling feeling kicks in. Something isn't right here, but there is only one way to figure out what it is...<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Gameplay<\/h2><br>Insaniam is a first person survival horror game, your objective is to retrieve at least five patient records for the abandoned facility. <br>You'll be forced to scavenge for batteries to keep your camcorder charged, utilize the night vision mode to explore the dark, use sanity pills or stay in the light to keep sane, avoid hallucinations, while something is lurking in the darkness and so much more.<br>Gameplay is based around a speed run mechanic where you'll play for shortest time to escape or longest time survived. flight-simulator, it is also a combined arms environment that includes our newly built anti-aircraft weapons system - the Sd.Kfz. 10\/5 Flak 38! This mobile anti-aircraft gun shoots a 20mm HE or AP round that can shoot down enemy planes or attack enemy ground targets with rapid fire! <br><br>Our Sd.Kfz. 10\/5 Flak 38 can be used in both single-player and multiplayer scenarios and includes several custom-made missions to demonstrate its ability at knocking down enemy planes. Also, you can play as the driver, gunner or commander and lead your team into deadly combat. Multiplayer supports multi-crew gameplay so you and your buddies can all man one truck together and work as a team! Most AAA systems in WWII were actually operated by a team of soldiers or sailors, not just a single person as popular movies or even other video games would have you believe.<br><br>Custom skins are also supported and we include summer and winter paint schemes to match your environment and better hide from the enemy. We also include support for our Tactical Code system so you can assign custom markings to your half-track.<br><br>The Sd.Kfz. 10\/5 Flak 38 also includes a detailed damage model with Dynamic Visual Damage support, so your half-track will bear the scars of battle and take realistic looking damage.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">History<\/h2><br>The Sd.Kfz. 10 or Sonderkraftfahrzeug (special motorized vehicle) was a German half-track that saw action throughout World War II and on all fronts in Europe and North Africa. Its main role was as a prime mover for small towed guns or liquid agents and it could also carry eight troops. Different models could be specialized for a wide range of duties.<br><br>It was powered by a Maybach 6-cylinder water-cooled gasoline engine. It had a semi-automatic Maybach Variorex-transmission with seven forward and three reverse gears. It could attain 65 km\/h (40 mph), while the cruising speed was 45 km\/h (28 mph). Steering was performed by both the front wheels and caterpillar treads. Shallow turns were done using the front wheels and sharper turns were done using the treads with one braking like a tank would.<br><br>Sd.Kfz. 10 \/5 carried the Flak 38 anti-aircraft gun in its rear bed and fired a 20mm projectile. The Flak 38 was an improvement over the older Flak 30 design and it had a rate of fire of 220 rounds per minute and weighed 420 Kilograms. Its use was ubiquitous throughout the war in all German theaters of operation and was the most produced artillery piece of the war by the Germans. Later designs mounted four Flak 38 cannons together for an added punch. The Flak 38 could also be towed by trucks or other vehicles when not mounted on Sd.Kfz. 10 half-tracks. In the right hands, this gun was deadly to low flying Allied fighters.<br><br><strong>Dimensions: <\/strong><br>Unladen weight ~4900 kg<br>Length: 4.8 m<br>Width: 2.4 m<br>Height: 2.4 m<br>Clearance: 310 mm<br><br><strong>Powerplant and Performance: <\/strong><br>Engine: Maybach HL42 TRKM, petrol<br>Maximum power: 100 HP at 2800 RPM<br>Maximum RPM: 3000 RPM<br>7 speed gearbox<br><br><strong>Maximum road speed:<\/strong><br>1st: 5.9 kph<br>2nd: 9.6 kph<br>3rd: 13.9 kph<br>4th: 21.4 kph<br>5th: 33.2 kph<br>6th: 51.4 kph.<br>7th: 69.6 kph.<br>Reverse 1st: 5.9 kph<br>Reverse 2nd: 9.6 kph<br>Reverse 3rd: 13.9 kph<br><br><strong>Maximum offroad speed:<\/strong> 25 kph<br><br>Internal fuel tanks capacity: 90 l<br>Engine oil system capacity: 12 l<br>Engine coolant: 18 l. of water<br>Endurance range: 260 km<br>Maximum oil consumption: 1 l\/h<br><br><strong>Protection: <\/strong> <br>6 mm rolled armor plated frontal shield<br><br><strong>Armament: <\/strong><br>Model: Flak 38 Autocannon (rifled 20 mm)<br>Barrel length: 65<br>Elevation: +85°..-12°<br>Ammo: up to 280 rounds (14 clips, 20 rounds per clip)<br>Rate of fire: 450 rounds per minute<br>Turret drive: mechanical, 6 seconds per rotation<br><br><strong>Ammunition:<\/strong><br>2 cm Pzgr. Multiplayer supports multi-crew gameplay so you and your buddies can all man one truck together and work as a team! We also include support for our Tactical Code system so you can assign custom markings to your half-track.<br><br>The Sd.Kfz. 10\/5 Flak 38 also includes a detailed damage model with Dynamic Visual Damage support, so your half-track will bear the scars of battle and take realistic looking damage.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">History<\/h2><br>The Sd.Kfz. 10 or Sonderkraftfahrzeug (special motorized vehicle) was a German half-track that saw action throughout World War II and on all fronts in Europe and North Africa. Its main role was as a prime mover for small towed guns or liquid agents and it could also carry eight troops. Different models could be specialized for a wide range of duties.<br><br>It was powered by a Maybach 6-cylinder water-cooled gasoline engine. It had a semi-automatic Maybach Variorex-transmission with seven forward and three reverse gears. It could attain 65 km\/h (40 mph), while the cruising speed was 45 km\/h (28 mph). Steering was performed by both the front wheels and caterpillar treads. Shallow turns were done using the front wheels and sharper turns were done using the treads with one braking like a tank would.<br><br>Sd.Kfz. 10 \/5 carried the Flak 38 anti-aircraft gun in its rear bed and fired a 20mm projectile. The Flak 38 was an improvement over the older Flak 30 design and it had a rate of fire of 220 rounds per minute and weighed 420 Kilograms. Its use was ubiquitous throughout the war in all German theaters of operation and was the most produced artillery piece of the war by the Germans. Later designs mounted four Flak 38 cannons together for an added punch. The Flak 38 could also be towed by trucks or other vehicles when not mounted on Sd.Kfz. 10 half-tracks. In the right hands, this gun was deadly to low flying Allied fighters.<br><br><strong>Dimensions: <\/strong><br>Unladen weight ~4900 kg<br>Length: 4.8 m<br>Width: 2.4 m<br>Height: 2.4 m<br>Clearance: 310 mm<br><br><strong>Powerplant and Performance: <\/strong><br>Engine: Maybach HL42 TRKM, petrol<br>Maximum power: 100 HP at 2800 RPM<br>Maximum RPM: 3000 RPM<br>7 speed gearbox<br><br><strong>Maximum road speed:<\/strong><br>1st: 5.9 kph<br>2nd: 9.6 kph<br>3rd: 13.9 kph<br>4th: 21.4 kph<br>5th: 33.2 kph<br>6th: 51.4 kph.<br>7th: 69.6 kph.<br>Reverse 1st: 5.9 kph<br>Reverse 2nd: 9.6 kph<br>Reverse 3rd: 13.9 kph<br><br><strong>Maximum offroad speed:<\/strong> 25 kph<br><br>Internal fuel tanks capacity: 90 l<br>Engine oil system capacity: 12 l<br>Engine coolant: 18 l. of water<br>Endurance range: 260 km<br>Maximum oil consumption: 1 l\/h<br><br><strong>Protection: <\/strong> <br>6 mm rolled armor plated frontal shield<br><br><strong>Armament: <\/strong><br>Model: Flak 38 Autocannon (rifled 20 mm)<br>Barrel length: 65<br>Elevation: +85°..-12°<br>Ammo: up to 280 rounds (14 clips, 20 rounds per clip)<br>Rate of fire: 450 rounds per minute<br>Turret drive: mechanical, 6 seconds per rotation<br><br><strong>Ammunition:<\/strong><br>2 cm Pzgr. Demo","steam_appid":1729010,"required_age":0,"is_free":true,"detailed_description":"Operation Outsmart is a physics-based sandbox adventure game set in a snowy open-world filled with koalas. The game has a main story line in which you need to help the koalas with their environmental issues. In order to do so, you need to use the build stations to construct machines from smaller engineering parts. You can use different materials for the building parts that affect their physical properties such as weight and strength. You can then hop on your machine and drive it to the quest areas to accomplish those missions. The koalas will reward you for your kindless, and give you further quests.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nThere are 3 koala villages in the world, and a total of 26 koala characters that you'll be interacting with. The quests that the koalas give you progressively get more difficult so you need to constantly improve your machines or craft new ones. You can also find new metal ores which you can smelt and mix with other metal elements in any proportion, thus being able to create infinitely many new alloys.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nSome of the key features are:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Koalas: Interact with koalas to reveal stories, hear gossip, learn about their history, get quests from them, and recruit them to fight for you. You can place the recruitable koalas on your machine and they will fight relentlessly.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n-  Walking and Driving: You can either explore the world on foot, or hop on your build and drive it around. Get on and off at your convenience.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Main missions: There is a main story line driven by the main missions you do. Although it is an open world, every mission unlocks new items that are necessary to tackle the next one.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Side quests: You can always go on to do smaller side quests that will reward you with useful items.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Build stations: There are several build stations in the world that you can walk up to and unleash your creative mind. Craft the most ridiculous and wacky machine you can think of. <br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Key bindings: Some parts are operable, which means you can assign key binds to them and operate them by pressing those keys.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Skins: Customise your machines by applying a variety of skins.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Save\/load machines: Save your machines to use them at a later time, or come back to work on them as you wish.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Material Foundry: You will discover metal ores in the world that you can take to one of the koalas to smelt it for you. You can then mix the metal elements you have unlocked in custom compositions to create new alloys.  These alloys will have entirely new properties, generated by a machine learning algorithm. You can then improve the physical properties of your machine parts by applying improved materials on them.","about_the_game":"Operation Outsmart is a physics-based sandbox adventure game set in a snowy open-world filled with koalas. The game has a main story line in which you need to help the koalas with their environmental issues. In order to do so, you need to use the build stations to construct machines from smaller engineering parts. You can use different materials for the building parts that affect their physical properties such as weight and strength. You can then hop on your machine and drive it to the quest areas to accomplish those missions. The koalas will reward you for your kindless, and give you further quests.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nThere are 3 koala villages in the world, and a total of 26 koala characters that you'll be interacting with. The quests that the koalas give you progressively get more difficult so you need to constantly improve your machines or craft new ones. You can also find new metal ores which you can smelt and mix with other metal elements in any proportion, thus being able to create infinitely many new alloys.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nSome of the key features are:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Koalas: Interact with koalas to reveal stories, hear gossip, learn about their history, get quests from them, and recruit them to fight for you. You can place the recruitable koalas on your machine and they will fight relentlessly.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n-  Walking and Driving: You can either explore the world on foot, or hop on your build and drive it around. Get on and off at your convenience.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Main missions: There is a main story line driven by the main missions you do. Although it is an open world, every mission unlocks new items that are necessary to tackle the next one.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Side quests: You can always go on to do smaller side quests that will reward you with useful items.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Build stations: There are several build stations in the world that you can walk up to and unleash your creative mind. Craft the most ridiculous and wacky machine you can think of. <br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Key bindings: Some parts are operable, which means you can assign key binds to them and operate them by pressing those keys.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Skins: Customise your machines by applying a variety of skins.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Save\/load machines: Save your machines to use them at a later time, or come back to work on them as you wish.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n- Material Foundry: You will discover metal ores in the world that you can take to one of the koalas to smelt it for you. You can then mix the metal elements you have unlocked in custom compositions to create new alloys.  These alloys will have entirely new properties, generated by a machine learning algorithm. gold.<br>A player obtains victory over the other players by controlling 6 islands or being the last ship sailing. There are many routes to that victory but the journey will without a doubt involve sailing your ships, firing cannons, seizing islands, and using faction abilities.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Sail ships<\/strong><\/h2>Players can move up to 3 ships on their turn and are able to move a ship up to 3 tiles unless aided by Known Tradewinds<br>Ships are able to turn in any direction players desire. Think of the movie Pirates of the Caribbean where they dropped anchor and drift a U-turn and outmaneuvered the Black Pearl.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Sailing.png?t=1631978135\" \/><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Movement.gif?t=1631978135\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Fire cannons<\/strong><\/h2>Step one of firing your epic cannons, count the number of tiles to the target. That is the minimum you need to roll to hit the target.<br>Step two, pay your crew to load and fire that cannon! 1 coin to fire a single shot. Roll to see if it is successful.<br>If successful, place a damage token under the target, if unsuccessful, roll better next time.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/FiringRange.png?t=1631978135\" \/><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Attacking.gif?t=1631978135\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Seize islands<\/strong><\/h2>When seizing an island, a player must first be adjacent to the island they would like to control. Once in position, pay 2 coins for the island along with a mast that belongs to the faction you are wrestling island control from.<br>Seizing an island that is defended is very costly. For each enemy ship that controls that island within 2 tiles adds 1 coin to the overall cost of seizing the island.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/SeizingControl.png?t=1631978135\" \/><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Claim.gif?t=1631978135\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Use faction abilities<\/strong><\/h2>When playing with faction abilities, each player selects 1 of the 6 factions to be. Each faction comes with 3 exciting and unique abilities that no one else has access to. These will help players turn the tide of war.<br>Abilities can cost coins to use or be limited on when you can use them, such as on your turn or when you seize an island.<br>On the left side of each faction card is an illustration, some adjectives to describe the faction and a quote the faction can be heard saying from time to time.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/FactionCard.png?t=1631978135\" \/><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Storm.gif?t=1631978135\" \/>","about_the_game":"Players begin the game as one of six factions with control of three islands, a fleet of ships and a handful of gold.<br>A player obtains victory over the other players by controlling 6 islands or being the last ship sailing. There are many routes to that victory but the journey will without a doubt involve sailing your ships, firing cannons, seizing islands, and using faction abilities.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Sail ships<\/strong><\/h2>Players can move up to 3 ships on their turn and are able to move a ship up to 3 tiles unless aided by Known Tradewinds<br>Ships are able to turn in any direction players desire. Think of the movie Pirates of the Caribbean where they dropped anchor and drift a U-turn and outmaneuvered the Black Pearl.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Sailing.png?t=1631978135\" \/><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727750\/extras\/Movement.gif?t=1631978135\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\"><strong>Fire cannons<\/strong><\/h2>Step one of firing your epic cannons, count the number of tiles to the target. That is the minimum you need to roll to hit the target.<br>Step two, pay your crew to load and fire that cannon! 1 coin to fire a single shot. tracks.<br><br><strong>Warning! Driving is hard: <\/strong><br>Driving the car is difficult, it is better to try slow first. Otherwise, the game will throw you out of the track, accompanied by loud &quot;boooom!&quot; and vibration on the gamepad, on collision.<br>I warned you :) <br><br><strong>Input Devices:<\/strong><br>You can control it from the <strong>gamepad<\/strong> (best case), the <strong>mouse<\/strong> (left-right: turn, LMB\/RMB: throttle\/brake) and using the <strong>keyboard<\/strong> (WASD, up\/down\/left\/right). Using a keyboard is extremely inconvenient, but you can try. The game has been tested mainly on an Xbox One gamepad.<br><br><strong>Gamepad control:<\/strong><br>For smooth steering, I used &quot;diagonal steering&quot;. Please pay attention for the second video for details. It is much more convenient than the straight left-right stick steering (for me). I will add control settings later. When ABS or Traction Control is on, you will feel a light vibration on the gamepad.<br><br><strong>About vehicle:<\/strong><br>There is only one car here - a futuristic sports car. The car has quite a lot of power (1200 hp at 1120 kg., Electric, four-wheel drive on the motor to the wheel). The car has its own &quot;durability threshold&quot;, over 40g (head-on collision 30 km\/h) - the car will shut down, the screen will blur, you will see the message &quot;Let's try again ;)&quot;. <br>The vehicle was modelled in Blender 3d.<br><br><strong>About track:<\/strong><br>The track in a futuristic city. is a non-linear MIDI sequencer allowing users to create expansive looping complex sequences which don’t subscribe to a definite timeline. Meter is determined only by a user’s imagination. Midinous can, however, still send MIDI clock messages to sync up devices and software.<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727420\/extras\/Midinous_Simple_Circuit.gif?t=1629776108\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\">How does it work, really?<\/h2>Midinous emulates a hardware MIDI controller by creating its own MIDI Input\/Output port on a computer, throwing away the need for any 3rd party software. Launch Midinous, and it can start sending MIDI data within seconds!<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">MIDI?<\/h2>Musical Instrument Digital Interface (MIDI) is the technical standard Midinous adopts to send data to other applications (usually, but not limited to, Digital Audio Workstations (DAWs)). Although Midinous can make simple sounds on its own, it is best used with a DAW.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Grid Based Editing<\/h2>Midinous works on a grid system where the distance between each tile is a quarter note. Arrange objects called ‘Points’ and connect them together with ‘Paths’ to quickly create complex looping or branching sequences of MIDI data. Branch to points randomly or instantly, split signals, or have signals travel in order of Path creation. Turn snapping mode off for complex meters and odd timing!<br><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727420\/extras\/Midinous_Point_Types.png?t=1629776108\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Customization and Accessibility<\/h2>Most keyboard controls have been made accessible by way of remapping, and the interface can be recolored as desired. Make Midinous as friendly as it needs to be.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">“Infinite” Canvas<\/h2>Midinous provides a virtually infinite scrollable canvas for creations. Though technically not limitless, Midinous can support the wildest of creations with full support for scrolling, panning, and zoom.<br><br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1727420\/extras\/Midinous_Grid_Pan.gif?t=1629776108\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Scale Snapping<\/h2>With Midinous’ scale snapping functionality, set a group of Points to a certain scale, or ensure the entire project aligns with a desired mode. Choose a key and a scale to quickly change the way a sequence sounds.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Relative Signals<\/h2>Carry MIDI data across multiple pathways with relative assignments for every attribute a Point object may have, such as MIDI Note, Channel, Velocity, Duration, and more. Good for ascending sequences and arpeggios.<h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Support For Other Operating Systems<\/h2>Midinous is being developed in a cross-platform framework that will allow it to run on either Linux or Mac operating systems as well as Windows. However, currently, Midinous is only available on Windows. \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Introduction and content of the game:<\/h2><br>In the 30th century, Earth science and technology evolved to a highly developed level. However, what people living on the surface of the Earth don't know is that there is another kind of intelligent life in the interior of the Earth. They have lived in the underground world since 65 million years ago. Facing the harsh underground environment, they have advanced civilization and advanced science and technology far superior to human beings. It is their dream to replace human beings to live on land, and they have made a conquest plan for tens of millions of years. As the earth's resources become increasingly barren, human beings gradually explore underground, and their plans are forced to start ahead of schedule. An unprecedented disaster broke out at the end of the Earth's 3047 years. A mysterious virus caused two thirds of the people in the world to suffer from muscle atrophy, respiratory failure and blindness to varying degrees, and finally died gradually in pain. A month later, a giant base suddenly appeared in the South Pole, and this group of invaders claiming to come from underground occupied the South Island and claimed to rule the earth. Because the virus caused 95% of the male deaths in the world, a group of brave girls spontaneously set up a &quot;prayer song&quot; unit to arm themselves with the existing advanced technology and fight for the protection of the world. The prayer troops gathered hot-blooded young people from all over the world, and according to different aspirations, they were mainly transformed into four types of occupations:<br>Attach importance to the &quot;strong attack&quot; of physical attack.<br>Pay attention to the &quot;prophet&quot; of spell attack.<br>Attach importance to the &quot;guardian&quot; of defense.<br>Pay attention to the &quot;redemption&quot; of treatment.<br>In 3074, as the best graduate of this year's Federal Commander College, you joined the &quot;Prayer Song&quot; unit and met a group of battle-hardened combatants and experienced commanders. Facing the severe situation and cruel battlefield, what choice would you make? Under your leadership, can we realize our good wish to save the world?<br><img src=\"https:\/\/cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com\/steam\/apps\/1726340\/extras\/火光.gif?t=1630539504\" \/><h2 class=\"bb_tag\">Game background:<\/h2>This is a challenging time. Everyone contributes to protect their homeland. Players will be transformed into army commanders, and they will fight through card battles by means of instant battles and four different occupations.<br>The overall perspective of the game is basically 2D perspective, in which most scenes and characters are all made in 2D, and the battle scenes are simple and easy to understand, which is convenient for players to operate immediately.<br>In the game, you can upgrade characters and change costumes on the main page of the game<br>The four occupations in the game have their own characteristics, which are matched with the hero skills and professional equipment exclusive to the characters to form your own combat team. The fetters between heroes will also make your team more solidified. Using different functional props in time will make your battle easier. The changeable levels and different enemies will make your adventure full of freshness. The unique collection elements of cards also satisfy the desire of some obsessive-compulsive players to collect. You can lead the troops deep into the enemy and go forward. Or keep the status quo with your heroes, and everyone can have the ending they want in the game.<br>. Click on the regional building of the big map to enter the battle checkpoint or activity copy. After each battle, the blood volume of players and heroes will be automatically restored, but the physical strength will be lost with the battle.
